statements: DELETE FROM money_laundering_transactions WHERE customer_id = 500 AND transaction_amount > 1000
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 10000 AND reason = 'Fraudulent Activity';
DELETE FROM potential_money_laundering_activities WHERE amount > 10000 AND suspicious_activity = true;
DELETE FROM transaction_details WHERE amount < 500 AND transaction_type = 'internal';
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE transaction_id = (SELECT transaction_id FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 1);
DELETE FROM suspicious_users WHERE report_type = 'fraudulent' AND name = 'John Doe';
